history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB00125
FULL TITLE : AN ACT AUTHORIZING THE GRANT OF COMPENSATION IN THE FORM OF ADDITIONAL HONORARIUM TO BARANGAY HEALTH WORKERS
ABSTRACT : Grants and additional regular monthly compensation to Barangay Health Workers in the form of an honorarium of four thousand pesos (P4,000.00).
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : LOBREGAT, CELSO L.
DATE FILED : 2016-06-30
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
NATURE : Reform
CO-AUTHORS (Journal Entries) :
1. Maceda (014 2016-08-23)2. Espino (016 2016-08-30)
3. Sarmiento (C.) (026 2016-09-26)4. Savellano (027 2016-09-27)
5. Panotes (034 2016-10-10)
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON LOCAL GOVERNMENT ON 2016-07-26
